subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nicole Powell scored 8 of her 13 points in the first quarter to help the Sacramento Monarchs score a 71-62 victory yesterday over the visiting Liberty, which lost its ninth straight, extending a record losing streak for the franchise.
